channel.title: Regulatory on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Regulatory on FinanClub

item.title: SNAP
item.description: score:-19 Chances: Snap Inc.’s visual messaging application has the potential to attract more users and increase engagement through short videos and images. The acquisition of Fit Finder IP back from Snap indicates potential future developments in the AR-focused business unit. Risks: The sale of shares by the CFO may indicate lack of confidence in the company’s future performance.

item.title: X
item.description: score:-22 Chances: U.S. Steel Corp. has the potential for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Nippon Steel Corp. made an aggressive all-cash offer for United States Steel Corp., indicating potential for a high acquisition price. Risks: The acquisition bid from Nippon Steel Corp.
